title: keke51
author: keke51
content: Hello world!I have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsI welcome everyone there. You can come and see the statistics. It would be nice if you stay:)I don’t know ways to promote a channel, so I decided to try it here)Everyone have a great day!

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMI have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsWhy not share the content with us here, as it is free there is no difference between creating threads here or in Telegram, and then you leave the choice to the user either by clicking on the link and joining your group or ignoring it.It is true that now you will get some followers, but they will soon leave, paste some of these signals here and leave some additional features for the Telegram channel.Trading calls (signals) is a high-risk investment and you should not trust any data without doing your own research.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on July 21, 2023, 08:49:35 AMQuote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMI have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsWhy not share the content with us here, as it is free there is no difference between creating threads here or in Telegram, and then you leave the choice to the user either by clicking on the link and joining your group or ignoring it.It is true that now you will get some followers, but they will soon leave, paste some of these signals here and leave some additional features for the Telegram channel.Trading calls (signals) is a high-risk investment and you should not trust any data without doing your own research.Imo, what is… is fine. Clicking telegram link won't do anything, you can view content without actually following, signals are posted, results are also.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Trying to determine the accuracy of your signals from just from the telegram group is hard or close to impossible. How sure are we that you did not delete some wrong calls before.Do you also trade your signals?Why don't you create a public profile on one of those portfolio tracking apps that can use your API keys so that we can independently verify your results and winrate minus having to completely depend on you?

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 22, 2023, 11:50:35 PMTrying to determine the accuracy of your signals from just from the telegram group is hard or close to impossible. How sure are we that you did not delete some wrong calls before.Do you also trade your signals?Why don't you create a public profile on one of those portfolio tracking apps that can use your API keys so that we can independently verify your results and winrate minus having to completely depend on you?this is true, how sure are we that he is totally honest with his stats and give only the good ones. well, it is free for now, but if he gained a lot of following, he may ask for fee later on. but since it is free, no harm done. up to the traders if they will check his signals and follow it. anyone can basically give a signal for no reason. so just be cautious in executing it in your actual trades. you can also do your own homework and see if there's some valid reason why his signal is valuable or not.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on July 21, 2023, 03:09:04 PMImo, what is… is fine. Clicking telegram link won't do anything, you can view content without actually following, signals are posted, results are also. Because he will control the content, he can prepare 100 predictions per day and at the end of the day he will delete the wrong predictions, and so on. If he continues to do so for a month, then most of the readings will be 99% correct.You will need to track the channel on a daily basis, which is difficult. It would be easier than that if he used third-party services such as the forum, since every modification is viewed.

comments.author: raidarksword
comments.body: Relying on trade signal on random person might be not a good idea at all hence it may have conflict of interest from the person's point of agenda giving trade signals to everyone. This also makes a good curiosity that it may have good or bad intentions for every trader in the space. Though it is a free signal, anyone can use it or neglects any signals conducted.

comments.author: bastian466
comments.body: Do group trading calls like the one above really give good and bad signals, such as promising profits and avoiding losses? Where can I view your trading history to build trust. so that everyone can see it transparently because if it really happens it can be trusted and it's free, it will be very helpful, I have never traded using it like that always use the results of my own research

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: What’s your credentials for a trader to believe on you?Showing your winnings should not be used to attract traders, if this is a free signal until the end then ok but I hope that newbie in trading should now relay on this and just learn on their own. There’s a lot of fake signal group so be careful on joining any group.

comments.author: jaberwock
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on July 21, 2023, 03:09:04 PMImo, what is… is fine. Clicking telegram link won't do anything, you can view content without actually following, signals are posted, results are also. Of course clicking the Telegram link can do some thing and that is it will redirect you to the channel or group although you can manually type in their name in the search box of the Telegram app and view the channel/group there. It's normal that we can see the contents even without joining them. That is the difference of a telegram channel from a group but it's going to be a hassle if you are going to check them from time to time if you won't click on the join button. Another perk of joining a channel/group is that you will have the option to receive notifications. Quote from: Husires on July 21, 2023, 08:49:35 AMWhy not share the content with us here, as it is free there is no difference between creating threads here or in Telegram,I think the main difference is that he has a full control of his channel than posting a thread here in the forum because it can get deleted by a moderator if they think it's inappropriate. Conversations inside telegram are also faster.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMHello world!I have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsI welcome everyone there. You can come and see the statistics. It would be nice if you stay:)I don’t know ways to promote a channel, so I decided to try it here)Everyone have a great day!   So you are trying to create a pump group, not that I'm against it but most of them groups just generate profit for their buddies or people who pay the most is this one of them groups.  Signals just means a pump group with a fancy name.  Either way I hope.ou don't screw people over like most of these groups do.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMI have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. ..To begin with, it would be appropriate to tell a little about yourself and your successes in the cryptocurrency market, while publishing screenshots here confirming your successful trading. Otherwise, your attempts to promote your telegram channel will not be successful among the forum participants.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Well, I'm going to be honest with you OP that it was hard to convince people from using signals these days, they are somewhat educated themselves already. No matter what you have to do or any promotion that you have this will just be wasted and rejected, maybe some will fall into that but the majority will ignore you. In fact, I couldn't really imagine what is the purpose of doing signals for free because if I do that, I simply ask for money from my subscribers. No, it wasn't just free, so I don't believe that word, sorry.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Yamifoud on July 28, 2023, 09:35:47 PM...In fact, I couldn't really imagine what is the purpose of doing signals for free because if I do that, I simply ask for money from my subscribers. No, it wasn't just free, so I don't believe that word, sorry. Usually, something is distributed for free only if it is planned to do it on a paid basis in the future. So the OP is at the initial stage at the moment and plans to attract as many participants as possible by offering its signals for free. But it can be stated for sure that he has a very poor presentation of his services.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMHello world!I have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsI welcome everyone there. You can come and see the statistics. It would be nice if you stay:)I don’t know ways to promote a channel, so I decided to try it here)Everyone have a great day!   After 6 years of Inactivity you come back just to post this and once again inactive ? wondering what is the main purpose of this because you only lure us to check your signal but not answering posts here.not sure if there will even one that may put interest in this kind of advertising .

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on July 29, 2023, 09:45:11 AMQuote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PM-snip-After 6 years of Inactivity you come back just to post this and once again inactive ? wondering what is the main purpose of this because you only lure us to check your signal but not answering posts here.not sure if there will even one that may put interest in this kind of advertising .These kinds of services sometimes have a special appeal among new traders - but may not be of much use to experienced traders. I've never joined one anyway so it's hard to understand how it works - so I'm looking to ignore it as much as I can.Regardless of the reason the OP posted his service here - but I think he has chosen the wrong board.

comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMHello world!I have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsI welcome everyone there. You can come and see the statistics. It would be nice if you stay:)I don’t know ways to promote a channel, so I decided to try it here)Everyone have a great day!   technically if you posting update here. you gain merit and rank, tg only is flooded with scammer here and thereits been around seeing this kinda things in many discord group.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMHello world!I have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsI welcome everyone there. You can come and see the statistics. It would be nice if you stay:)I don’t know ways to promote a channel, so I decided to try it here)Everyone have a great day!   Here's a tip for you. Create a tradinview account to prove your track record. If that confirms that your signals are making profit, you could just charge people for that service. Right now only reason for such a channel to exist is an attempt to have a crowd to pump your bags. AKA illegal manipulation tactic called pump & dump.If you however would have a tradingview trackrecord where you can't just erase your bad signals from the history, you would be taken seriously. If you have a system that works, you would be mad not to advertise it via tradinview account. Unless your system doesn't work, which is more plausible.

comments.author: tokeweed
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on July 21, 2023, 08:49:35 AMQuote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMI have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsWhy not share the content with us here, as it is free there is no difference between creating threads here or in Telegram, and then you leave the choice to the user either by clicking on the link and joining your group or ignoring it.It is true that now you will get some followers, but they will soon leave, paste some of these signals here and leave some additional features for the Telegram channel.Trading calls (signals) is a high-risk investment and you should not trust any data without doing your own research.This...  So keke51, want more interest in your channel?  Give us a taste of your content and try to interact more with the people in the BCT community, the toughest guys to convince in crypto.  We have seen it all.  Cheats, scams, hacks, etc, etc..  You name it.  So just posting about your channel and expecting that the people here are dumb enough to join it then you got another thing coming.Not trying to diss you, just saying it's better to show your content here and interact with the people then maybe some of us will join.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: keke51 on July 20, 2023, 07:46:36 PMHello world!I have created a telegram channel providing trading signals. Its free) the name is 5min calls. Link to join https://t.me/fivemincallsI welcome everyone there. You can come and see the statistics. It would be nice if you stay:)I don’t know ways to promote a channel, so I decided to try it here)Everyone have a great day!   You don't need to share the telegram link to increase the number of participants. You can contribute your knowledge to Bitcoin talk trading discussions or create a public profile.
